Who is he?

  • Alan was born in 1994, though his youthful exuberance makes this hard to believe.
  • Began studying for his Bachelor's in Computing at National College of Ireland.
  • Completed his Bachelor's degree in Computing, specialising in Multimedia & Game Development.
  • Joined the Accelerate graduate programme at Version 1.
  • Began Studying for his Master's in Creative Digital Media at Technological University Dublin.
  • Completed his Master's project, a Game based on Irish folklore. Available to download for Windows at Itch.io.
  • Joined MyHome.ie working as part of a small team, designing, developing, and testing a brand new frontend, which is now live!
